entry.title: Rational 56.00.210A - Combi Oven Cleaner Tabs - 100 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rational
Type: Chemicals
Price: 108.00

Rational's cleaning tabs, designed for their ovens, are phosphate-free which makes them environmentally friendly. They are simple to use and have been developed by Rational with an intensive complex of active ingredients to go up to 70% further than liquid cleaners. Simply place one tablet in the drain basket of your Rational oven and run the cleaning cycle through per your machine's instructions.

While these tabs are effective in cleaning ovens, they aren't meant for removing limescale and calcium buildup. If that is something you're looking for, we also carry Rational's oven delimer tabs. People often will run one cycle with the cleaner, then follow with one cycle with the delimer when needed. Keep in mind that cleaner is used much more often.

      • Goes up to 70% further than liquid cleaner
      • Formulated for SelfCookingCenter and CombiMaster ovens
      • Comes in a pack of 100 individually wrapped tablets

SPECS

Model 56.00.210A
Compatible with SelfCookingCenter and CombiMaster ovens
Brand Rational
Quantity 100

DOWNLOAD SAFETY DATA SHEET

entry.title: Rational 56.00.562 - Combi Oven Delimer Tabs - 100 Pack
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rational
Type: Chemicals
Price: 127.00

Rational's delimer tabs, designed for their ovens, are simple to use and have been developed by Rational with special scale-dissolving ingredients to prevent limescale buildup and guarantee maximum operational reliability without a water softener or more time-consuming descaling. Simply place one tablet in the drain basket of your Rational oven and run the cleaning cycle through per your machine's instructions.

While these tabs are effective in removing buildup from ovens, they aren't meant for general cleaning. If that is something you're looking for, we also carry Rational's oven cleaner tabs. People often will run one cycle with the cleaner, then follow with one cycle with the delimer when needed. Keep in mind that cleaner is used much more often.

      • Formulated with special scale-dissolving ingredients
      • Great for locations with hard or low-quality water
      • Formulated for SelfCookingCenter and CombiMaster ovens
      • Comes in a pail of 100 individually wrapped tablets

SPECS

Model 56.00.562
Compatible with SelfCookingCenter and CombiMaster ovens
Brand Rational
Quantity 100

DOWNLOAD SAFETY DATA SHEET

entry.title: Rational iCombi Classic - Gas Combi Oven with Manual Controls - 10 Half-Sized Pans
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rational
Type: Combi Oven
Price: 15822.00

The iCombi Classic is made for those who want a manually-operated, classic combi-steamer. It comes with all the essential cooking capabilities -- steam, convection, combi-steam, and a special cooling feature. With it, you'll find yourself saving on energy, resource consumption, and time.

The models CD2GRRA.0000272/270 are natural gas or liquid propane heated, can house 10 half-sized sheet pans, and comes with a removable, standard hinging rack. The vertical space between rails is 2.6". As for the combi-steamer modes, you'll be getting a steaming range of 86 to 266 degrees Fahrenheit, a convection range of 86 to 572 degrees Fahrenheit, and a combination range of 86 to 572 degrees Fahrenheit. 

      • 304 stainless steel
      • Gas heated
      • Digital display
      • 4 automatic cleaning programs

SPECS

Model CD2GRRA.0000272 / CD2GRRA.0000270
Capacity 10 x 1/1 GN | 10 13" x 18" sheet pans | 10 12" x 20" steam pans
Dimensions (WDH) 33.5" x 33.125" x 41.875"  
Weight 266 lb
Casters None
Voltage 3 AC 208 V / 3 AC 240 V
﻿Phase ﻿3
Meals Per Day 80-150

WARRANTY

Two years parts and labour. Five year warranty on the steam generator. 

DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.title: Rational iCombi Pro - Gas Combi Oven with Touch Screen Controls - 20 Full-Sized Pans
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rational
Type: Combi Oven
Price: 47517.00

The Rational iCombi Pro is truly a next generation combi oven. With its four self-cooking intelligences it is extremely easy to use, allowing you to fry, roast, grill, steam, poach, bake, etc. a wide variety of products from meat and vegetables to baked goods and desserts.

The models CG1GRRA.0000264 and CG1GRA.0000245 are liquid propane and natural gas, intelligent, connectable systems that can fit 20 full-sized sheet pans. They also come equipped with a removable, standard hinging rack that provides different rack options on all of its levels. Regarding the combi steamer modes, you'll get a range of 86 - 266 degrees Fahrenheit for steam, 86 - 572 degrees Fahrenheit for convection, and 86 - 572 degrees Fahrenheit for combination.

      • 304 stainless steel interior and exterior
      • Natural gas or liquid propane heated
      • Triple-pane cooking cabinet door
      • Energy Star certified

VIDEO

    FEATURES

    iDensityControl®

    This is the iCombi Pro's intelligent climate management. Intelligent sensors, a high-performance heating system and fresh steam generator, and active dehumidification interact to ensure that the right cooking cabinet climate is always available. iDensityControl ensures extraordinary productivity while maintaining high levels of food quality, even cooking, and minimum energy consumption.

     

    iCookingSuite®

    This is the iCombi Pro's cooking intelligence. With 6 operating modes and 5 cooking methods to choose from, and desired result specification, the unit suggests settings while intelligent sensors detect the size, quantity, and condition of the food. During the cooking process, the system continues to adjust parameters like cabinet temperature, airspeed, and cooking time to the second. Thanks to iCookingSuite you can save time, raw materials, and energy while maintaining food quality without having to check the procedure.

    iProductionManager®

    This function intelligently and flexibly organizes the production process. This includes which products can be prepared together on different trays, the ideal sequence of dishes, and monitoring the cooking sequence. It supports users with prompts, arranges the sequence of dishes according to order positions, schedules them based on a certain target time, and more.

    iCareSystem®

    This is the intelligent iCombi Pro cleaning and descaling system. It recommends the amount of chemicals and ideal cleaning stage from nine available programs based on usage and any limescale in the steam generator. Interim cleaning cleans the unit in only 12 minutes, and all cleaning programs can also run overnight without the need for supervision. It consumes small quantities of phosphate-free care products, water, and energy. This means that your unit is always clean without manual work and at minimal costs.

    SPECS

    Model CG1GRRA.0000264 / CG1GRA.0000245
    Capacity     20 x 1/1 GN | 20 full-size sheet pans | 40 12" x 20" steam pans
    Dimensions (WDH) 42.6" x 44" x 73.75" 
    Weight 936 lb
    Casters None
    Voltage 2 AC 208 V

    WARRANTY

    Two years parts and labour. Five year warranty on the steam generator.

    DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET

entry.title: Rational iCombi Pro - Electric Combi Oven with Touch Screen Controls - 20 Half-Sized Pans
entry.summary:
Vendor: Rational
Type: Combi Oven
Price: 29338.00

The Rational iCombi Pro is truly a next generation combi oven. With its four self-cooking intelligences it is extremely easy to use, allowing you to fry, roast, grill, steam, poach, bake, etc. a wide variety of products from meat and vegetables to baked goods and desserts.

The models CF1ERRA.0000224 is an electric, intelligent, connectable system that can fit 20 half-sized sheet pans. It also comes equipped with a removable, standard hinging rack that provides different rack options on all of its levels. Regarding the combi steamer modes, you'll get a range of 86 - 266 degrees Fahrenheit for steam, 86 - 572 degrees Fahrenheit for convection, and 86 - 572 degrees Fahrenheit for combination.

      • 304 stainless steel interior and exterior
      • Electric heated
      • Triple-pane cooking cabinet door
      • Energy Star certified

VIDEO

    FEATURES

    iDensityControl®

    This is the iCombi Pro's intelligent climate management. Intelligent sensors, a high-performance heating system and fresh steam generator, and active dehumidification interact to ensure that the right cooking cabinet climate is always available. iDensityControl ensures extraordinary productivity while maintaining high levels of food quality, even cooking, and minimum energy consumption.

     

    iCookingSuite®

    This is the iCombi Pro's cooking intelligence. With 6 operating modes and 5 cooking methods to choose from, and desired result specification, the unit suggests settings while intelligent sensors detect the size, quantity, and condition of the food. During the cooking process, the system continues to adjust parameters like cabinet temperature, airspeed, and cooking time to the second. Thanks to iCookingSuite you can save time, raw materials, and energy while maintaining food quality without having to check the procedure.

    iProductionManager®

    This function intelligently and flexibly organizes the production process. This includes which products can be prepared together on different trays, the ideal sequence of dishes, and monitoring the cooking sequence. It supports users with prompts, arranges the sequence of dishes according to order positions, schedules them based on a certain target time, and more.

    iCareSystem®

    This is the intelligent iCombi Pro cleaning and descaling system. It recommends the amount of chemicals and ideal cleaning stage from nine available programs based on usage and any limescale in the steam generator. Interim cleaning cleans the unit in only 12 minutes, and all cleaning programs can also run overnight without the need for supervision. It consumes small quantities of phosphate-free care products, water, and energy. This means that your unit is always clean without manual work and at minimal costs.

    SPECS

    Model CF1ERRA.0000224
    Capacity     20 x 1/1 GN | 20 13" x 18" sheet pans | 20 12" x 20" steam pans
    Dimensions (WDH) 34.5" x 31.125" x 70.125" 
    Weight 579 lb
    Casters None
    Voltage 3 AC 208/240 V

    WARRANTY

    Two years parts and labour. Five year warranty on the steam generator.

    DOWNLOAD SPEC SHEET
